mainText:
Steve was my generations Einstein. My first computer experience was with an Apple 2 when I was in 6th grade in the tiny town of Mount Hope Kansas population 500. It ignited a burning desire that still burns today in me. You will be missed, but never forgotten. Thanks for being different, thank you for being amazing. Your genius was only surpassed by your grace, Gods speed mr Jobs...

Thank you seems so inadequate....
author: Raubin
